data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Montagnes, Côte d‘Ivoire that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Montagnes, Côte d‘Ivoire

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Montagnes
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Montagnes, Côte d‘Ivoire a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 38,856 believers in the state of Montagnes into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Neho people.
Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the state of Montagnes, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Montagnes, Côte d‘Ivoire.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.section_summary:
the state of Montagnes, Côte d‘Ivoire has a population of 400,400.

We estimate Montagnes has 38,856 people who might know Jesus, 85,602 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 275,942 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 10 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 400,400 souls in Montagnes and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.
